entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
